Name: Dead Space 2 Severed
Overview:
Dead Space 2: Severed is a two-chapter downloadable content pack for Dead Space 2. The game takes place on Titan Station and follows the story of Gabe Weller and Lexine Murdoch.

Severed is set three years after the events of Dead Space: Extraction. Gabe Weller now works for the Sprawl Security . During a patrol in the Titan Mines, the Necromorph outbreak was unleashed.

Gabe then has to fight his way through the Sprawl, find Lexine and escape from the infested station. Gabe's story runs parallel to Isaac Clarke's experiences in the Dead Space 2 campaign; this can be seen throughout Severed as Gabe stumbles upon the remains of Isaac's various battles.
